summary: Comprehensive backend testing completed for TC AD/SB Detection mechanism. All 27 individual tests across 8 test suites passed with 100% success rate. The monthly detection system is fully functional with proper authentication, detection logic, alert management, audit logging, and aircraft integration.
passed_tests: GET /api/tc-adsb/audit-log - Audit log access with filtering
Aircraft model AD/SB fields integration (adsb_has_new_tc_items, count_new_adsb, last_tc_adsb_version, last_adsb_reviewed_at)
Detection skip logic for same version (prevents duplicate processing)
Error handling for invalid aircraft IDs (404 responses)
Force detection with specific TC version
Audit logging with proper event types and traceability
